sql-case.value: ALTER USER user_dev identified by passwd_dev
ALTER USER 'user_dev'@'localhost' identified by 'passwd_dev'
ALTER USER user_dev account lock
ALTER USER user_dev WITH NAME = user_dev_new
ALTER USER user_dev RENAME TO user_dev_new
ALTER USER user_dev WITH PASSWORD = 'passwd_dev'
ALTER USER user_dev WITH PASSWORD 'passwd_dev'
ALTER USER user1
ALTER USER user1, user2
ALTER USER IF EXISTS user1
ALTER USER 'user1'@'localhost'
ALTER USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY 'password'
ALTER USER user1 WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1
ALTER USER user1 WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 1
ALTER USER user1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT
ALTER USER user1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT PASSWORD HISTORY DEFAULT
ALTER USER user1 ACCOUNT LOCK
ALTER USER user_unlock ACCOUNT UNLOCK
ALTER USER user_conn_limit WITH MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 10
ALTER USER user_user_conn_limit WITH MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 5
ALTER USER user_none REQUIRE NONE
ALTER USER user_ssl REQUIRE SSL
ALTER USER user_x509 REQUIRE X509
ALTER USER user_tls REQUIRE SUBJECT 'subj' ISSUER 'issuer' CIPHER 'cipher_name'
ALTER USER user_expire_interval PASSWORD EXPIRE INTERVAL 30 DAY
ALTER USER user_expire_never PASSWORD EXPIRE NEVER
ALTER USER user_history PASSWORD HISTORY 5
ALTER USER user_reuse PASSWORD REUSE INTERVAL 10 DAY
ALTER USER user_require_optional PASSWORD REQUIRE CURRENT OPTIONAL
ALTER USER user_require_yes PASSWORD REQUIRE CURRENT
ALTER USER user_failed_lock PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT FAILED_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS 5 PASSWORD_LOCK_TIME 7
ALTER USER user_lock_unbounded PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT PASSWORD_LOCK_TIME UNBOUNDED
ALTER USER user_plugin IDENTIFIED WITH 'ldap'
ALTER USER user_plugin_as IDENTIFIED WITH 'ldap' AS 'pwd'
ALTER USER user_plugin_by IDENTIFIED WITH 'ldap' BY 'pwd'
ALTER USER user_plugin_rand IDENTIFIED WITH 'ldap' BY RANDOM PASSWORD
ALTER USER user1 WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 1 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 1 PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT PASSWORD HISTORY DEFAULT ACCOUNT LOCK
ALTER USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY 'pwd_doris'
ALTER USER user_history PASSWORD EXPIRE DEFAULT PASSWORD HISTORY 5 PASSWORD REUSE INTERVAL 10 DAY
ALTER USER user_lock ACCOUNT LOCK PASSWORD EXPIRE
ALTER USER user_ssl REQUIRE SSL
ALTER USER user_limits WITH MAX_QUERIES_PER_HOUR 10 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 5
ALTER USER user1 IDENTIFIED EXTERNALLY
ALTER USER user1 IDENTIFIED GLOBALLY AS 'CN=user1'
ALTER USER user1 DEFAULT TABLESPACE tablespace1
ALTER USER user1 CONTAINER = ALL
ALTER USER user1 QUOTA 1M ON tablespace1
ALTER USER user1 IDENTIFIED BY password ACCOUNT LOCK
ALTER USER user1 PASSWORD EXPIRE ACCOUNT LOCK
ALTER USER user1 GRANT CONNECT THROUGH user2
ALTER USER user1 GRANT CONNECT THROUGH user2 WITH ROLE role1
ALTER USER johndoe DEFAULT ROLE clerk_role

ALTER USER user1 GRANT CONNECT THROUGH user2 REVOKE CONNECT THROUGH user3

ALTER USER CURRENT_USER WITH ENCRYPTED PASSWORD 'password'

ALTER USER ALL SET client_min_messages = DEBUG
